stork.feather.util

Class HexDumpResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.Resource
      • stork.feather.util.AnonymousResource
        • stork.feather.util.HexDumpResource

  • public class HexDumpResource
extends AnonymousResource
    A destination Resource which prints a hexadecimal representation of incoming data to an OutputStream or, by default, to System.out. This is used for testing Feather Taps.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class stork.feather.Resource

        path, session
